name: NofX Multi-Agent Orchestrator
description: Telemetry data collected by the NofX extension

properties.services.registered: Number of services registered in container
properties.agents.active: Number of active agents at startup
properties.tasks.total: Number of tasks in queue at startup

properties.type: Type of agent created (e.g., frontend, backend)

privacy.dataCollection: This extension collects anonymous usage data to help improve functionality and performance.
privacy.optOut: Users can disable telemetry in VS Code settings (telemetry.telemetryLevel = 'off')
privacy.dataRetention: Data is retained according to Azure Monitor retention policies
privacy.piiCleaning: All personally identifiable information is automatically removed
